thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com
thread.title: Dennis

author: Dennis
title: Dennis
text: I ordered 5 fruit trees last year and all of them died. I told them early on that they looked like they were dead, but they insisted on me scraping the trunk for a couple of months. They questioned my planting, but I followed their directions exactly. So, they agreed to send me replacement trees provided I pay another $125. Since I had already invested about $800, I agreed to do it. So, I received the new set of trees in February and planted them. To date, it looks like 2 out of the 5 are also dead. This is a very unreliable company. I will not be paying them another dime!
